name: create_score
attributes: # [doc = " プロフィールと初期スコアを作成"]
body: let prof = & mut ctx . accounts . profile ;
prof . owner = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;

name: submit_score
attributes: # [doc = " 新しいスコアを提出（既存のハイスコアを超えた場合のみ更新）"]
body: let prof = & mut ctx . accounts . profile ;
let user = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;

fields.name: profile
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Reinit Attack 防止：同一アカウントを二度初期化できない"] # [account (init , payer = user , space = 8 + 32 + 4)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 操作するユーザー（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: profile
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 型チェック＆所有者チェック (Owner Check / Type Cosplay)"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " スコアを提出するユーザー（署名必須）"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " このプロフィールを操作できるユーザー"]
